attributes.action: ban the use of the Mosquito Dispersal Device on the Grounds of Age Discrimination.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The Mosquito - It is a product that sends out a high frequency sound which is painful and disturbing to people under the age of 25.

Its objective is to rid of youngsters 'Hanging around’ areas such as residential areas and outside retail outlets. This is treating young people like animals and poses some serious human cruelty issues.

Harming peoples ears as well as dictating where we can and can't go, Where exactly do you want us to go? We live in a world where the authorities and many higher aged people do not understand the behavior and social structure which younger people have to live through. 

Ban the mosquito and get the Police to do their jobs properly by sorting out the minority of teens which cause disruption. DON'T TREAT US LIKE ANIMALS!!

rejection.details:
You may wish to add your name to the existing petition:
http://petitions.number10.gov.uk/devicemos385/
reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
